snippet: The Cessna 414 twin-engine aircraft took off from Indianapolis and crashed near Central Illinois Regional Airport in Bloomington after midnight, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
abstract: Private plane coming from NCAA basketball tournament in Indianapolis crashes in central Illinois killing all seven people on board, including Illinois State University associate head basketball coach Torry Ward and deputy athletics director Aaron Leetch.
lead_paragraph: The Cessna 414 twin-engine aircraft took off from Indianapolis and crashed near Central Illinois Regional Airport in Bloomington after midnight, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

headline.main: Illinois: Seven People Killed in Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Seven People Killed in Plane Crash
